title: Twitter Reacts To BeyoncÃ© Dropping Out Of Coachella â€” And It's Not Pretty!
text:
BeyoncÃ© 's doctors are gonna need doctors of their own!
The BeyHive shed a tear of self pity on Thursday when Parkwood Entertainment announced the superstar had to pull out of Coachella due to her pregnancy!
Twitter reacted appropriately following the surprise announcement, with Bey fans in regretful hysterics over purchasing festival tickets solely to see their Queen.
Photo: Pregnant Bey Enjoys NBA All-Star Game With Blue Ivy
And no, the fact that the singer said she'd headline the 2018 festival instead didn't make things betterâ€¦
Though regular concert-goers got a better kick out of the cancellation, anticipating plenty of last minute tickets to be available when YoncÃ© fans realize they don't want to travel to the desert to see Radiohead .
All we can say is, those damn twins better be cute AF
See the mass social media hysteria BeyoncÃ© caused (below)!
